title: gOpAla sajjana
sahitya:
gOpAla sajjanapAla gOkula paripAla dayALA


anupallavi

  gOpiyaruLLam Adaiyum kavar kaLvA draupadi mAnam kAtta mudalvA
 dEvaki vasudEvar tavap-pudalvA shrI rukmiNi kELvA emmaiyALvAi


caraNam    un pAdamE satatam nambinOm anbAlum tiru nAmam pulambinOm
 tunbAzhiyil shuzhalinum nI tuNai inpAdamum UTTinum ninnaruL shrI
